control.description-key: A control to drag and drop files and upload to the entity SharePoint library folder.

property.name: boundEntityField
property.description-key: Any field to bind this control.

property.name: clientId
property.description-key: The AzureAD Client Id of the control.

property.name: sharePointSiteGuid
property.description-key: The id of the SharePoint Site to send files to.

property.name: useRelationship
property.description-key: This entity stores SharePoint documents based on SharePoint entity structure (Account/Contact).

property.name: primaryEntityFieldLogicalName
property.description-key: The logical name of the primary field of this entity (i.e. name).

property.name: relationshipLogicalName
property.description-key: The logical name of the relationship to use for the SharePoint entity structure. Ex. parentaccountid.

property.name: parentEntityTypeName
property.description-key: The logical name of the parent enitty. Note: should be account or conact and match sharepoint entity structure.

property.name: parentEntityPrimaryFieldName
property.description-key: The logical name of the primary field of the parent entity. Note: Should be: name
